Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to limiting fines for the late payment or evasion of tolls charged by a public authority
Summary: Limits fines for the late payment or evasion of tolls charged by a public authority to twenty-five percent of the toll owed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to limiting fines for the late payment or evasion of tolls charged by a public authority
